#summary upcoming release 0.3.8 notes

=Google Chrome Developer Tools for Java. Release 0.3.8.=

This release succeeds the [Release_0_3_6 release 0.3.6].

==Overview==

Features

* exception breakpoints
* launch configuration move
* i74
* ruler
* i76
